name: Merehead
description:
Merehead is a creative web development and design company that provides professional services with increased conversion to the business. We solve the most demanding web challenges in smart and elegant ways for companies all over the world.
Our clients are from various industries like finance, international transportation, aviation, HORECA (food & beverage), marketing and social media.
Merehead is a team of professionals, which solve tasks for business promotion and development. An individualized approach and high-quality development let's our clients achieve considerable success. Over 70% of our customers become permanent.
We love meeting people and build strong lasting relationships.
